price: پس به ستایش پروردگارت تسبیح گوی و از او آمرزش بخواه؛ همانا او بسیار توبه‌پذیر است.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban
